column6: Food Processing Unit Operations I Lab
column7: Focus on topics discussed in Food Processing Unit Operations I (FSHN 481) in a food grade environment. Students will have opportunities to operate pilot scale food processing equipment for each unit operation. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. Prerequisite: FSHN 481.
column9: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. Prerequisite: FSHN 481.
